name: King's Path (Le Chemin du Roy)
description:
Every morning, King Penguin awakens and brings joy to all the people of the kingdom. After the "levée" cermenony, the King, also spiritual guide of the people, has to wander through the country to meditate in front of all the shrines of the King's Path - as the tradition wants it. But as the ritual is every day the same, the walrus usurpers will try to trap him. Protect him with your army and allow to perpetuate the millenial tradition.

Game made for GGJ 2016. Theme was Ritual..

Art : @PingouinRaptor, @UsagiBD

GD: @f_renou

Programming: @arche_san, @UsagiBD's boyfriend
